articles.content:

articles.title: Rwanda denies hacking Ramaphosa, but exiles in SA say spying is 'a way of life' - News24
articles.description: The Pegasus Project data leak revealed that President Cyril Ramaphosa may have been the target of Rwandan cyber hacking. While Kigali denies this, Rwandan exiles living in South Africa are unsurprised.
